exps.name: Force required to move a wooden block
exps.description: To establish relationship between weight of a rectangular wooden block lying on a horizontal table and the minimum force required to just move it using a spring balance.

exps.name: Verification of Newtons Second Law
exps.description: Newtons Second Law  of motion states that the rate of change of momentum of an object is proportional to the applied unbalanced force in the direction of the force.

exps.name: Bell Jar Experiment
exps.description: To demonstrate that sound needs a material medium for its propagation.

exps.name: Separation of Mixtures Using Different Techniques
exps.description: To separate the components of a mixture using the following techniques:      Separating funnel     Chromatography     Centrifugation     Simple distillation     Fractional distillation
